English.title: Road Bike Fit Recommendation Tool

inseam: Vertical distance from heel to crotch
trunk: Distance from C7 to iliac crest
forearm: From lateral epicondyle to radial styloid
thigh: From ASIS to top of patella
leg: From bottom of patella to medial malleolus

English.stack_fail: âŒ Too much difference. Consider changing frame
English.stack_too_high: âŒ Frame stack is too high, even with 0 spacer â†’ Consider a lower-stack frame

English.reach_unfit: âŒ Needs {required} mm stem (default: {default} mm) â†’ Consider a {direction} stem or change frame size
